about.author: Author
about.bot_desc:
MahinaBot is a feature-rich Discord bot optimized for music playback, bringing you an exceptional audio experience. Supporting multiple platforms, MahinaBot enables seamless music streaming from YouTube, Spotify, SoundCloud, and more.

Key features include a robust queue system, customizable filters, 24/7 mode, and comprehensive DJ controls. The bot is designed for reliability and high performance, ensuring uninterrupted music enjoyment for your Discord community.

join.title: Thanks for adding me!
join.description:
Hi! I'm **{{bot}}**, a music bot made with ‚ù§Ô∏è by **{{author}}**.

To get started, use `/help` to see all available commands.

Join our [support server]({{support}}) if you need help!
